content: **this is for dolls ** this is a wide-brimmed hat with a slightly wavy brim that gives a vivacious impression this pattern is sized to fit the body of knit doll keito keito s body size ◆height 37cm to the toes ◆bust 18cm ◆waist 13cm ◆hips 18cm ◆foot 3 5cm this hat size may not be able to be worn depending on the doll s hair volume hat size the circumference of the opening 14 cm i use japanese size crochet hooks this pattern is posted on my blog so please check it out i hope you enjoy my pattern
